GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19.2 to before v5.19.6
GSD.description:
binder_alloc: add missing mmap_lock calls when using the VMA

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.6 by commit 7b0163c1b07b7ff1717aa975821c40df98786ddc, it was introduced in version v5.19.2 by commit 1ec3f76a436d750fd5023caec5da0494fc2870d2. For more details please see the references link.
